title: Roman Dzhigkayev
text:
Roman Taymurazovich Dzhigkayev (; born 29 November 1993) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20West%20Armenia">FC West Armenia</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Armavir">FC Torpedo Armavir</a> on 28 March 2015 in a game against <a href="FC%20Krasnodar-2">FC Krasnodar-2</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Luch-Energiya%20Vladivostok">FC Luch-Energiya Vladivostok</a> on 11 July 2016 in a game against <a href="FC%20Mordovia%20Saransk">FC Mordovia Saransk</a>.
Personal life.
He is the younger brother of footballer Georgi Dzhigkayev.
